content.description:
An editable list of grants and fellowships of interest to the Scuttlebutt community (with the event time is set as the next application due date), as well as a place to collect backlinks to relevant discussions and resources.

## Upcoming opportunities

## Ongoing Opportunities

| Name | Purpose | Frequency |
| -------- | ----------- | -------------- |
| [Mozilla Open Source Software Fund](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/moss/) | Fund OSS projects used by or related to Mozilla's mission | ? |
| [Mozilla Research Grants](https://research.mozilla.org/research-grants/) | Develop the Open Web Platform, New Explorations | 2 times/year |
| [Alfred P. Sloan Foundation](https://sloan.org/grants/apply#tab-the-grant-application-process) | Support early-stage research for which private or government funding is hard to obtain, support early-career (tenure-track) researchers | year-round, depends on program |
